title: The Colonels
description: They were the professionals, the men who had been toughened by combat in the mine-laden fields of Europe, in Korea, in Greece, in Indochina.  Now, in the twilight of a dying decade, they must return to the United States to forge a new type of American soldierâ€”one to be tested on the beaches of Cuba and in a new war yet to come...
author: W.E.B. Griffin
